# 2023-05-29 1550 SPDC measurment
# both crystals are (again) oriented in the same direction
# temperature scan betwen 24 and 90 C 
# this measurement now includes the coincidence stage where we seperate single photons based on polarization per channel 
# this should now provide a nice temperature scan without any q beating interference. just an nice PM peak (at least in coincidences) 
# --------------------------------- 
# input laser power: 30 mW at 1550 nm (245 mA) 
# pump polarization: H# periodic pooling: 9.03 um# initial setup alignment at 22.0 C# integration time: 60 s 
# single photon detector darkcounts: 3.4 kHz 
# single photon detector QE: 30% 
# single photon detector dead time: 20 us 
# ---------------------------------- 
# Temperature    Clicks_1    Clicks_2    Correlations 
# [C]    [/]    [/]    [/]
